metadata.title: CVE-2018-18248 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Icinga Web 2 has XSS via the /icingaweb2/monitoring/list/services dir parameter, the /icingaweb2/user/list query string, the /icingaweb2/monitoring/timeline query string, or the /icingaweb2/setup query string.

criterions.comment: icingaweb2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
